```adblock
||res.cl$badfilter

to user rules.

comment.body:
As a temporary solution please add this rule:
```adblock
conservation.forest.gov.tw#@#a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
```
to user rules.

<hr>

@realodix Could you please take a look?
PDF icon is blocked by this rule:
```adblock
##a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
```
from `AdBlockID` filter list.

issue.title: qwant.com

labels.name: A: In progress
labels.description: Work on the issue is in progress

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.37

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.qwant.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When using AdGuard annoyance filter the searchbar from qwant.com is missplaced when scrolling instead of being sticky in the header.

## Bug

<details>

<summary>Search is placed in the middle of the page</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490682-796a59a5-e896-446b-bc0b-5eacf0efa43b.png)

</details>

## Expected result 


<details>

<summary>Search should be in the header</summary>

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490749-06b251b6-09f9-4917-8fd7-8ba677df4da5.png)

</details>

## Cause

Someone added a rule that overwrites a CSS variable used to position the searchbar `--header-offset`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

issue.title: Qwant.com search is missplaced
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard Browser Extension

### AdGuard version

4.1.37

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Desktop

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.qwant.com/

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

When using AdGuard annoyance filter the searchbar from qwant.com is missplaced when scrolling instead of being sticky in the header.

## Bug

<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490682-796a59a5-e896-446b-bc0b-5eacf0efa43b.png)
</details>

## Expected result 


<details>
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/395137/197490749-06b251b6-09f9-4917-8fd7-8ba677df4da5.png)
</details>

## Cause

Someone added a rule that overwrites a CSS variable used to position the searchbar `--header-offset`

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

> 
> ```
> conservation.forest.gov.tw#@#a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
> ```
> 
> to user rules.
> 
> @realodix Could you please take a look? PDF icon is blocked by this rule:
> 
> ```
> ##a[target="_blank"][rel*="nofollow"] > img[src*=".gif"]
> ```
> 
> from `AdBlockID` filter list.

Done, thank you
